name: Insignia
description: Insignia is an interactive agency from Poland. From over 16 years we create efficient Internet communication. We are proud to work with clients: Jurajska, Bosch, Gaspol, Total, Unilver, Procter&Gamble, Frito Lay, Konica-Minolta, Sheraton, Dekoral, Grupa Żywiec, Alitalia, Lotos, Samsung, Siemens Mobile, Michelin, Intersport, Metsa Tissue, and more.
